column1: The Pit Room////As I was perusing their menu
column2: I started to worry about their pricing because I thought this place was going to be like Pinkerton's where everything is Ã  la carte. But then I saw that they actually offered diner plates so I opted to get the three-meat dinner plate with brisket
column4: and pork ribs along with mac n cheese and mustard potato salad on the side.
